title: Task 41

question.text: Which of the following statements is true based on the audio about Linda?

answers.answer: She started working with the team this year.
answers.feedback: Remember, the dialogue mentioned when Linda joined the team.

answers.answer: She is responsible for financial management in the company.
answers.feedback: Consider Linda's role as mentioned in the dialogue.

answers.answer: She has been with the team for five years.
answers.feedback: Recall the specific time frame mentioned about Linda's tenure with the team.

answers.answer: She creates user-friendly interfaces and joined the team last year.

dialogue.text: Finally this is Linda our UX UI designer.
She joined the team last year. She loves creating user-friendly interfaces.

description: Listen to the audio and answer the question.
